Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were received by the film 'Gangubai Kathiawadi' released in 2022?
Options:
A. National Film Award for Best Actress
B. Filmfare Award for Best Film
C. International Indian Film Academy Award for Best Director
D. Zee Cine Award for Best Story
Correct Answer: National Film Award for Best Actress, Filmfare Award for Best Film

Question & Options:
Which of the following accolades were received by the movie 'Gangubai Kathiawadi' released in 2022?
Options:
A. National Film Award for Best Feature Film
B. Filmfare Award for Best Actress
C. International Film Festival Award
D. Screen Award for Best Film
Correct Answer: Filmfare Award for Best Actress, International Film Festival Award
